div1.p: Blue informs Carter of his commission as Senior Surgeon.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, October 7, 1912
div1.opener:
[unclear]
MJM
OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL
IN REPLYING ADDRESS THE
SURGEON GENERAL PUBLIC HEALTH
AND MARINE-HOSPITAL SERVICE
(TREASURY DEPARTMENT)
BUREAU OF
PUBLIC HEALTH (AND MARINE-HOSPITAL SERVICE
WASHINGTON
October 7, 1912.
Senior Surgeon Henry R. Carter,
United States Public Health Service,
U.S. Marine Hospital, Louisville, Kentucky.
Sir:
div1.p:
There is transmitted this day, by registered mail,
your recess commission as Senior Surgeon in this Service,
effective October 1, 1912. You are directed to acknowledge
the receipt of this commission.

You will also execute an oath of office, in duplicate,
on the inclosed forms, transmitting both copies to the
Bureau.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, Rupert Blue
Surgeon General. sec.
2 inclosures.
Announcement of Commis-
sion as Senior Surgeon.
for $9.25 $9.25
